name: HOBOT-298 Window Cleaning Automatic Robot with Ultrasonic Water Spray, Intelligent Cleaning, AI Smart Route Plan, Replaceable Water Tank, and Control via Smartphone or Remote

other_info.Included Components: Set of clothes (3pcs/pack), Extension cord, AC Adapter, Safety rope, HOBOT Window Detergent

about_this_item: Effortless and efficient cleaning: Innovative ultrasonic water spray nebulizes water into dense mist to dissolve dust and polish windows without leaving watermarks. A powerful vacuum safely attaches the robot to the surface while extracting dust and removing all impurities.

Safety and reliability design: An auto-adjustable pneumatic pad automatically controls the driving force and keeps the force between the caterpillar treads and cleaning cloth in balance. Auto-edge detection with AI-smart route planning navigates the robot in zigzag pattern in horizontal and vertical directions suitable for frameless windows. A long (15 ft) safety rope and embedded UPS (Un-interrupted Power System) prevents the robot from falling in case of a power outage.

Large cleaning area and position memory: Large size (9.5 X 9.5 inches) cleaning cloth, long power and included extension cords provide a wide range of cleaning coverage ideal for not only residential use but also small-scale businesses such as restaurants, cafes, offices, etc. The robot automatically returns to its starting point once the window is cleaned, ensuring easy access and removal in hard-to-reach areas.

Replaceable water tank and control via smartphone APP or remote: In case the ultrasonic spraying nozzle is clogged, simply replace the entire water tank or spraying nozzle with a standard screw driver. Receive notifications and alerts on your smartphone, such as when a task is completed, by installing HOBOT APP.

Please read the included manual before use. You can also use the link to video tutorial on the box. The robot works with power cord ONLY. Do NOT use on frames with non-rectangular (rounded) edges. Minimum surface cleaning area is 13—Ö13 inches for any glass thickness of 3 mm or more. FAQ are found on our Amazon store page.

title: Large, medium and small Hobot does them all.
content: From small, medium to large windows Hobot does them all.  We've struggled for ten years with our windows and were never satisfied with our hand cleaning results.  We have a lot of different size windows and Hobot is excellent on all of them, but is outstanding on our larger ones where it seems to do the best because of more mobility movement.  Our windows are now the best they have ever looked and we could not be more pleased.  The price point has always been the sticking point for us, but it sure beats a broken bone or worse from a ladder fall or the cost of a professional cleaner. 3/4 of our windows are two and three stories high.  We haven't started on those yet, but on the lower level where we can reach with two feet on the ground it did excellent and we are now proud of our windows.  We are so proud we are going to name our Hobot "Sparkle."  If Sparkle has longevity and holds up well without costly repairs or replacement then it will be money well spent.  Highly recommend anyone that is hesitant to go ahead and bite the price bullet as we don't think you will ever be sorry.  If you do decide to get one make sure you do as Hobot says by either dusting your windows first with the Hobot and blue pads (optional, not included) or with a swifter if this is the first time using the Hobot.  We followed the Hobot protocol and could not be happier!  We love the included liquid cleaner and will always be using that instead of plain water.  My only suggestion to Hobot is to make a duel pair where they will synchronize with each other and do the inside and outside windows at the same time as this would be a perfect set up for us!  Think about doing this Hobot and and then send us royalties.  Ha!  Sparkle needs a roomie named Shine.

title: Easy to use, Works very good
content: This cool gadget sprays a very fine micro mist ahead of its path, then sweeps the area with what is basically a micro-fiber pad.  No heavy mist, no scrubbing back and forth to get the crud off.  The vacuum feature suctions the machine on to your window, but doesn't "vacuum" off the dirt.  If you had a foot square micro-fiber cloth mounted on a flat piece of cardboard and gently slid it over your window after an extremely light mist of Windex, you would simulate the cleaning action of this product.  Try it.  It just doesn't work on the inside or outside.  Won't remove a light finger print on the inside or even light waterspots on the outside.  Dang, I wished this worked!  In ten years, we'll all be washing our house windows with a robotic product, but the technology isn't there yet.

title: Not ready for prime time.
content: If you are looking for something to polish your already-clean windows, this is for you. While it touts it's use of fluid, it is essentially a dry operation. After numerous uses it's used about an ounce of fluid. When it finishes the window and you take it off, the cleaning pad feels completely dry. All that would be okay if a perfectly cleaned window was left behind, but it only gets the most superficial dirt. It gets a small fraction of the dirt I get by doing the window by hand. Hand cleaning a just-robot cleaned window produces a paper towel with significant dirt on it. On the other hand, if you hand clean your windows and can't get the streaks off, this machine does that pretty well. I'm quite disappointed with the performance based on the price of this machine. I'm keeping it, but just to clean up the streaks. In all fairness, if you did your windows with this every week, it would probably work well. It just doesn't work well unless the window is pretty clean already.
